conversation.prompt:
Use MCP tools to fetch the problem description and parameter schema.
MCP_SSE_URL: http://127.0.0.1:9020/sse
Propose genetic algorithm parameters as a JSON object with keys: crossover_type (order|onepoint|twopoint|evenodd|partialmatch|cycle|uniform), selector_type (roulette|tournament|rank), crossover_probability, mutation_type, mutation_probability, elitism (true/false), population_size, generations. Use concise values only. No explanation.
